oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Konsum ökologischer Milch aus gesundheitlichen Gründen - Eine qualitative Erhebung auf deutschen Demeter Milchviehbetrieben und bei ihren Kunden
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kusche, D.
Sahm, H.
Baars, T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Supposedly beneficial nutritional compositions were found in organic milk. Studies report that the consumption of organic milk products affects health eg. prevention of eczema in children. Single cases describe a better digestibility of organic milk for consumers suffering from diverse atopic disorders and food allergies. To clarify whether this is a real phenomenon, a survey in combination with interviews was carried out on bio-dynamic milk farms and with affected consumers in Germany. The results show that there are consumers which are buying fresh bio-dynamic raw milk because of a better personal digestibility.
